title: For me Lolesports is stuck in Portuguese.
body:
Really not sure what's going on.. I'm in the USA.. and suddenly when I went to watch some games. The website loaded in Portuguese.. even when I Google the website. And follow the link it still loads like this..
I'm really not sure what I'm supposed to do..
Is anyone else having this issue?? How do I fix it?

replies.body:
Choose language top right to english (click the globe symbol).
I also randomly had portugues selected today, even though I previously opened the website with english (default setting I'm assuming for my IP)
Thank you very much that fixed it.. perhaps it's a global issue..

Hey Enjoy my Q -- could you do me a favor and take a quick visit to [watch.lolesports.com/location.json](http://watch.lolesports.com/location.json) and let me know what you see on the page there? We've seen a few reports of this off-behavior and I'm investigating what could be going on. Also, if you could let me know generically where in the US you are from that would also be great. Thanks!

Not them, but I had the same issue, I live in Wisconsin and I see: {"code":"US","area":"NA","locale":"en-US"}

I had already changed my page back to English, so if that would affect the above, pardon me.

Thanks! This is super bizarre (and sorry for the issue!)

And nope! The link above actually informs your choice of language (we have a "suggested" language that we will default you, unless you have already selected a language)
This happened to me over the weekend so I can’t check it now, but I live in the DC area.
Take the opportunity and learn some of my native language {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
